text: Jab aur kaam ka faisla ker diya hayega to shetan kahey ga kay Allah ney to tumhen sacha wada diya tha aur mein ney tum say jo waday kiye thay unn ka khilaf kiya mera tum per koi dabao to tha hi nahi haan mein ney tumhen pukara aur tum ney meri maan li pus tum mujhay ilzam na lagao bulkay khud apney aap ko malamat kero na mein tumhara faryad rus aur na tum meri faryad ko phonchney walay mein to siray say manta hi nahi kay tum mujhay iss say pehlay Allah ka shareek mantay rahey yaqeenan zalimon kay liye dard naak azab hai
